resources.string: Explore historical facts about your environment.

string-array.name: UK_array
string-array.item: The United Kingdom is home to the town with the longest name in the world, Llanfairpwllgwyngyllgogerychwyrndrobwllllantysiliogogogoch, fortunately the town is known also as Llanfairpwllgwyngyll or simply Llanfair PG.
The shortest war in history was between Zanzibar and Great Britain, and it lasted only 38 minutes.
